import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col} from 'react-bootstrap'; import GitHubCalendar from 'react-github-calendar'; import { Form, Grid, Image, Transition } from 'semantic-ui-react' const transitions = [ 'slide down', 'slide left', 'slide right' ] const options = transitions.map((name) => ({ key: name, text: name, value: name, })) export default class About extends React.Component{ state = { animation: transitions[0], duration: 100, visible: true } handleChange = (e, { name, value }) => this.setState({ [name]: value }) handleVisibility = () => this.setState((prevState) => ({ visible: !prevState.visible })) render(){ const { animation, duration, visible } = this.state return(

about me

Full-stack web developer with a passion for problem-solving. With experience in Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, and React I discovered web development while taking computer science classes and I fell in love with it. I bring strong skills in working with people, communication in English and Spanish as well as managing people. I spend my free time playing guitar as well as building small projects and learning about new technologies.
